nithipathiwarayata mema naduwa thawaduratath pawathwagena yamata adahasak nomathi bawata aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwa adhikaranayata danum dima hethuwen mema naduwa awasan kirimata kolambaa athireka mahesthrathwaraya piyawara gaththa.hitapu manthri sajin da was gunawardhanata apa labadimata erehiwa wirodhatha athnam me masa 16 wanida idiripath karana lesa kolambaa mahadhikarana winisuru mahilal waidyathilaka, nithipathiwaraya wetha ada niyoga kala.
